item.title: Creating a website with Hugo
item.description: Introduction In this series, I want to describe how I created and manage this web site. I started my career as developer working in a Web Agency, long time ago in 1998. At that time, creating so-called static sites was pretty normal. At that time, we developed a tool for managing templates that allowed us to generate and update pages very quickly and easily. Then it came the “server-side” era, with .
